allow: Bash(cmd /c "for /f ""tokens=5"" %a in (''netstat -aon ^| findstr :1420 ^| findstr LISTENING'') do taskkill /PID %a /F")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete MVP with full CRUD and automation engine

Implemented complete Pet, Event, and Task management with automation workflows.

Core Features:
- Pet Management: Full CRUD with species, breed, sex (5 options), DOB
- Event Management: Full CRUD with Booking, Consultation, TrainingSession, Payment, FollowUp types
- Task Management: Full CRUD with priority (1-5), status tracking, overdue alerts
- Automation Engine: 3 active workflows with extensible rule-based architecture

Automation Workflows:
1. Booking â†’ Questionnaire Check Task (48 hours before consultation)
2. Consultation Complete â†’ Protocol Send Task
3. Training Session â†’ Preparation Task (2 days before)

UI Components:
- PetForm, PetsTable with dialog modals
- EventForm, EventsTable with automation hooks
- TaskForm, TasksTable with priority colors and quick actions
- New UI components: Dialog, Select (Radix UI)

Technical Improvements:
- Timestamp handling in all service layers (createdAt, updatedAt)
- Query invalidation for automation-created tasks
- Australia/Melbourne timezone throughout
- Desktop shortcut for quick launch
- Updated CLAUDE.md to v1.0.0 (MVP Complete)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add automatic Jotform questionnaire sync with file downloads

Implemented automatic questionnaire sync that polls Jotform API, downloads
submitted forms (JSON + PDF), and saves them to client folders.

Backend Changes:
- Added Tauri commands for file operations (write_text_file, write_binary_file)
- Commands write JSON data and download PDFs to client folders
- Proper error handling and path validation

Service Layer:
- Created jotformService.ts with full Jotform API integration
- Fetches submissions from both Dog and Cat questionnaire forms (last 30 days)
- Parses submission data (QID-based field extraction)
- Client matching by email (primary) or mobile (fallback)
- Downloads JSON data (structured submission) and PDF (formatted questionnaire)
- Saves files to client folder with timestamped filenames
- Creates "Questionnaire Received" event with submission details
- Validates client has folder before downloading

UI Components:
- Created QuestionnaireSync.tsx dashboard component
- Shows unprocessed submissions with client/pet info
- Manual "Process X Submissions" button (similar to booking sync)
- Real-time sync results with success/failure indicators
- Shows which files were downloaded (JSON, PDF)
- Compact styling matching dashboard design

Configuration:
- Added Jotform API key and form IDs to .env
- VITE_JOTFORM_API_KEY
- VITE_JOTFORM_DOG_FORM_ID
- VITE_JOTFORM_CAT_FORM_ID

Form Field Mapping (both forms use same QIDs):
- QID 3: Full Name (first/last)
- QID 6: Email (client matching)
- QID 32: Phone Number (client matching fallback)
- QID 8: Pet Name
- QID 19: Breed
- QID 23: Age
- QID 22: Sex
- QID 68: Address
- QID 69: Weight

Error Handling:
- Skips submissions if client not found (doesn''t create client automatically)
- Skips if client folder not created yet
- Continues processing other submissions if one fails
- Shows specific error messages in UI

Future Enhancements:
- Track processed submission IDs to avoid re-processing
- Auto-poll on app startup or every N minutes
- Update pet data from questionnaire (if more detailed)
- Notification when new questionnaire available

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code (https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
